settings.label: Enable variant images
settings.info: When enabled, product gallery will show only images associated with the selected variant option (typically Color).

settings.label: Media grouping option
settings.info: The option name used to group images by variant. Images are associated with variants via featured media or alt text containing the option value.

settings.content: Only one option name at a time. For multilingual stores, enter multiple values separated by commas: Color,Colour,Farbe,Couleur
How to assign images to variants
Method 1: In Shopify admin, edit a variant and set its 'Featured image' to the main image for that variant.
Method 2: Set the image alt text to include the option value (e.g., 'Blue front view' for Blue variant).

settings.default: Search for products, collection and blogs...
settings.label: t:settings_schema.search.settings.search_placeholder_heading.label
